name: CandyWitch (forasterxd)
description:
My second game of all my life. 

CandyWitch

By Sebastian De La Quintana, Mateo Salinas and Andres Salinas

An "horror" -action game where you play as Hansel from Hansel&Gretel, the witch is alive and she is converting the people in Candy. So you have to look for her house in the forest and finally kill her.

The development of this game was chaotic, I formed a team and started of a great Metroidvania + Dark Souls Game, but our lack of experience, and other events showed us that no, we were not expecting this result. But if you play the game, thank you.

Controls

Use the arrows to move

C to Jump

X and Z to attack

Shift to run

Ctrl to use things
